author: joakime
msg: [MRM-565] Archiva 1.0-beta-3 fails in 404 on all legacy request.
Added test for get of artifact using legacy path.

author: ate
msg: JS2-793: Support deployment of jetspeed under a custom context name (e.g. ROOT) with the maven 1 jetspeed plugin
See: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-793
- adjusted template Tomcat 5.0.x and 5.5.x context deployment descriptors:
- for Tomcat 5.5,x the path and docBase attributes are no longer needed/required
- for Tomcat 5.0.x the path still needs to be set, whereas for a ROOT deployment an empty "" value needs to be specified

author: joakime
msg: [MRM-565] Archiva 1.0-beta-3 fails in 404 on all legacy request.
Using new methods in RepositoryRequest to identify native resource path early and using it.
Adding PolicingServletRequest to deal with bad formatted request paths.
Beefing up RepositoryServletTest to test proxy-less (for now) requests ...
* Browse
* Get Checksum (default layout)
* Get Checksum (legacy layout)
* Get Metadata (versioned + default layout)
* Get Metadata (project + default layout)
* Get Artifact (default layout)
Adding custom mime-types.txt to get proper "Content-Type" headers on GET requests.

author: ate
msg: JS2-793: Support deployment of jetspeed under a custom context name (e.g. ROOT) with the maven 1 jetspeed plugin
See: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-793
- Support for Tomcat 5.0.x too which requires the context path to be defined in the context deployment descriptor (e.g. "" for ROOT)

author: brianf
msg: [maven-release-plugin]  copy for tag maven-2.0.8
